name: FastMath-LD41
description:
A game made for Ludum dare 41 in game Compo category. 

The theme was to mix to incompatible genre so here we go with a 2 player western game with math/riddle.

This is a 2 player game where you have to find the answer to problem/riddle given. The answer to that would give you a numeric value which will be your minimum allowed time to shoot another player in order to win.if you shoot before the right numeric value you lose. 

Controls:

Left Side Player    -  Space
Right Side Player -  Left Mouse Button
